content:
hi all
i created a concept map which is mapping from a specific source code to one or more target codes. the strange thing is, after building the IG the target code is displayed, but not the display string. i.e. http://build.fhir.org/ig/ehealthsuisse/ch-vacd/ConceptMap-ch-vacd-vaccines-targetdiseases-cm.html
ist this a known issue?
I had the same problem, then I removed the display values in the source and then the display values were shown in the rendered IG. It's not in a public repository, but may it helps for looking at it.
@Grahame Grieve thanks for the fix! it's working now.
